title: UWP Image control and bitmapsource
body:
The image control only supports BGRA8 encoding and the Win2d Control’s supported type is also determined by BitmapPixelFormat. They are very unfriendly to Machine Vision developers. NV12 and Gray8 are two basic formats, but they don't be supported. When we get the pure image data without image file head info, we don‘t want to chang the pure data. That
will waste in performance. So we hope that UWP Image control and ImageSource can support more and more pixelformat, like as WPF .NET Framework.
